name: ocrMultipart
description: Returns a prediction from an OCR model for the specified image URL or local image file.

modelId.description: ID of the model that makes the prediction. Valid values are OCRModel and tabulatev2.

sampleContent.description: Binary content of image file uploaded as multipart/form-data. Optional.

sampleId.description: String that you can pass in to tag the prediction. Optional. Can be any value, and is returned in the response.

sampleLocation.description: URL of the image file. Use this parameter when sending in a file from a web location. Optional.

task.description: Optional. Designates the type of data in the image. Default is text. Valid values: contact, table, and text.

$ul: **sampleId**: Same value as request parameter. Returned only if the sampleId request parameter is provided.
**task**: Same value as request parameter. Returns text if the request parameter isn't supplied.
